Pre-Game Insights: Afghanistan face up to the ideal they are working towards. India have long been the benchmark ODI side but even they'll know Rashid and Gurbaz, on their day, can trip them up.
Hashmatullah Shahidi spoke glowingly about the ability within his Afghanistan team.
Afghanistan have played a mere 29 matches between the last World Cup and this one.
India vs Afghanistan Pitch Report: The pitch for this match will likely help the batters. South Africa and Sri Lanka scored more than 700 runs in the last match at this venue.

India vs Afghanistan Weather Forecast: The weather will be mostly cloudy for this 2023 World Cup game. Rain isn't expected throughout the course of the match. The temperature will hover around 30 degrees Celsius.
The Feroz Shah Kotla was the scene where World Cup records tumbled with South Africa and Sri Lanka aggregating the highest match total and Aiden Markram amassing the fastest century.
KL Rahul remarked the morning after India's sapping start to the World Cup.
Afghanistan made it to this tournament without needing a qualifier, won a bilateral series in Bangladesh.
Afghanistan's first two ODI World Cups have come in Australia and England, conditions less suited to their spin-centric style.
India vs Afghanistan, October 11, 2023, 14:00 IST at Arun Jaitley Stadium, New Delhi.
A warm day in the national capital and good conditions for batting. The re-laid surface in Delhi sports a generous smattering of grass.
Teams batting first have won five of the last six ODIs here dating back to 2013.
Left-arm finger spinners have picked 21 wickets in the first six matches at 26.52 in this World Cup.
Since his comeback, Bumrah has not gone wicketless even once and in the six ODIs he has conceded his runs at an average of 4.89 per over.
Among members of India's squad, Jadeja has the most wickets in ODIs against Afghanistan [7 at 10.85] and in Delhi [9 at 20.77].
Hashmatullah Shahidi on facing an even more potent spin attack than that of Bangladesh's to whom they lost 6 for 62.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Their head-to-head record stands at: 05/03/2014: Dhaka - India won by 8 wickets, 25/09/2018: Dubai - Match Tied, 22/06/2019: Southampton - India won by 11 runs.
